item.title: SAP for Me as the New, Personalized Central Entry Point for SAP Support
item.description: SAP for Me helps make performing support-related tasks easier and more efficient in one place. Read to learn more.

item.title: Real-Time Support Channels Take Big Steps Forward in Customer Care
item.description: With Real-Time Support, SAP is moving towards a bidirectional, predictive, and effortless support future. Read to learn more.

item.title: Maintenance Notification: February 12, 2022
item.content:encoded:
Maintenance Notification: February 12, 2022

There will be momentary disruptions to Sapserv7/9 server landscape in Singapore DC on Saturday, February 12, 2022, from 15:00-20:00 UTC (00:00-05:00 JST; 23:00-04:00 China time; 16:00-21:00 CET).

During this outage, the following services are unavailable:

  • Problem analysis and/or service delivery on customer systems
  • Transfer Early Watch Alert data
  • Data exchange via SAP Note Assistant
  • Customer messages via SAP Solution Manager
  • Connectivity to SAP’s Support Backbone

item.title: Maintenance Notification: November 30, 2021
item.content:encoded:
Maintenance Notification: November 30, 2021

There will be downtime to Sapserv5 (Japan) servers on Tuesday, November 30, 2021, from 18:00-19:00 JST (17:00-18:00 China Time; 10:00-11:00 CET).

During this outage the following services are unavailable:

  • Problem analysis and/or service delivery on customer systems
  • Transfer Early Watch Alert data
  • Data exchange via SAP Note Assistant
  • Customer messages via SAP Solution Manager
  • Connectivity to SAP’s Support Backbone

item.title: Helping Customers Navigating Through Difficult Times: No CPI Increase for Support Contracts in 2022
item.description: With this newly granted price stability, SAP contributes to the strong partnership with our customers.
item.content:encoded:
Helping Customers Navigating Through Difficult Times: No CPI Increase for Support Contracts in 2022

SAP remains vigilant and focused on supporting our customers, partners, employees, and communities during the COVID-19 pandemic. SAP understands that the current situation might lead to additional unforeseen challenges on customers’ businesses and continues to be committed to help every organization and industry across the world in a fair and equal manner.

Therefore, the Executive Board of SAP SE has decided:

  • For 2022, the company will again not apply the annual increase based on the local Consumer Price Index (CPI)* to SAP Standard Support contracts.
  • The company will also continue to not apply increases for SAP Enterprise Support.

With this newly granted price stability, SAP contributes to the strong partnership with our customers.

Please note that this CPI waiver for 2022 is not a waiver of the contractually agreed possible adjustments of the maintenance fee for any potential future increases.

*CPI is used as a measure of inflation, in some markets, different systems are referred to (e.g. Labor Cost Index in Germany). These figures are published by governments or the authorized authority in each country

https://main--builder-prospect-prod--sapudex.hlx.page/fragments/news/article-details

https://main--builder-prospect-prod--sapudex.hlx.page/fragments/news/article-read-more

item.title: Maintenance Notification: July 5, 2021
item.description: During the interruptions the below service for Sapserv 1 (VPN connections) may be affected:
item.content:encoded:
Maintenance Notification: July 5, 2021

Due to maintenance, there will be multiple interruptions for Sapserv 1 (VPN connections) on Monday, July 5, 2021 from 13:00-16:00 JST (12:00-15:00 China Time; 6:00-9:00 CET).

During the interruptions the below service for Sapserv 1 (VPN connections) may be affected:

  • Problem analysis and/or service delivery on customer systems
  • Transfer Early Watch Alert data
  • Data exchange via SAP Note Assistant
  • Service connection reservation
  • Customer messages via SAP Solution Manager

item.title: Maintenance Notification May 9, 2021
item.description: During the interruption, the below service for Sapserv 7/9 (VPN connections) may be affected:
item.content:encoded:
Maintenance Notification May 9, 2021

There will be an outage to Sapserv7 and Sapserv9 (Singapore) servers due to Network Switches firmware upgrade in SNG3 (sindc01-Main DC) on Sunday, May 9, 2021, from 11:00-20:00 JST (10:00-19:00 China Time; 4:00-13:00 CET).

During the interruption, the below service for Sapserv 7/9 (VPN connections) may be affected:

  • Problem analysis and/or service delivery on customer systems
  • Transfer Early Watch Alert data
  • Data exchange via SAP Note Assistant
  • Service connection reservation
  • Customer messages via SAP Solution Manager
